Package hac.repo.room

Class Room

java.lang.Object
hac.repo.room.Room
@Entity public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a game room where players can join and play a game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    Room.RoomEnum
    Enumerates the possible states of the room.
